timeline.message:
Add boolean values script fields

This adds `boolean` values `runtime_script` fields.

timeline.bodyText: I'm trying to mimic what we support in core. It works, so far as I can tell. It is kind of amazing we allow this at all, but we do!
timeline.author: nik9000

timeline.bodyText: I must say that multiple values for booleans look really weird, especially trying to summarize multiple values into one, and re-sorting them. Is this behaviour documented anywhere?
timeline.author: javanna

replies.bodyText: I'm not sure it is, though it is what happens when you use doc values for out of the box booleans.
replies.author: nik9000

timeline.bodyText: I never realized this either: booleans are double????
timeline.author: javanna

replies.bodyText: Ooops, copy and paste error. Fixing.
